results.title: Introduction/Overview - Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB
results.description: ...rless NoSQL database for modern app development,Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB is a fully managed NoSQL database service that enables you to run MongoDB workloads in the cloud with minimal changes to your application code. This API supports the MongoDB wire protocol, so you can use your existing MongoDB drivers, software development kits (SDKs),.
